capacitySpecification.description: Specifies the read/write throughput capacity mode for the table.

clientSideTimestamps.description: Enables client-side timestamps for the table. By default, the setting is disabled.

defaultTimeToLive.description: The default Time to Live setting in seconds for the table. More information can be found in the [Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/keyspaces/latest/devguide/TTL-how-it-works.html#ttl-howitworks_default_ttl).

encryptionSpecification.description: Specifies how the encryption key for encryption at rest is managed for the table. More information can be found in the [Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/keyspaces/latest/devguide/EncryptionAtRest.html).

keyspaceName.description: The name of the keyspace that the table is going to be created in.

pointInTimeRecovery.description: Specifies if point-in-time recovery is enabled or disabled for the table. More information can be found in the [Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/keyspaces/latest/devguide/PointInTimeRecovery.html).

schemaDefinition.description: Describes the schema of the table.

tableName.description:
The name of the table.

The following arguments are optional:

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

ttl.description: Enables Time to Live custom settings for the table. More information can be found in the [Developer Guide](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/keyspaces/latest/devguide/TTL.html).
